richtest.Databases

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • richtest.Databases.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a database for an open project. All the database-related activities and actions must be done within this class All the database queries are within this class
    Author:
    MaTrIx
